title: Awakenings: Eight Tales of Erotic Adventure from Two Amazing Worlds
description: FOR ADULTS ONLY.  Eight stories with several unique points-of-view will take you on an intensely erotic, wildly bizarre, and strangely fulfilling journey.  An apprentice casts his first spell, not knowing that it would lead to a unexpected encounter with a beautiful witch and a dozen curious faeries. An astronaut makes First Contact with an entity on Mars that results in a surprisingly spiritual experience. An adventuring wizard battles the Spider Queen and learns that she is more than just a monster. These are just some of the tales to be found in Awakenings.  Awakenings is split between two the fantasy world of the Academy where wizards work some most intriguing magic, and a future Earth where humans and aliens get to know each other in some very unusual ways.  Just what is read can never be unread.
author: Dan Westercamp
